roleset.name: sequencing of letters

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: Quayle 'is in fine company with his spelling of potato .

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: The Smithsonian Institution's Global Volcanism Program cites the Indonesian name, Krakatau, as the correct name but says that its spelling as Krakatoa is also often used.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, spell.01.
